resources.string: I am pleased to present You our mineralogical services related to the preparation and study of ore/rock samples under a microscope.
In our team there are excellent specialists in mineragraphic, petrographic and geochemical studies with about 40 years of experience. \n Sincerely yours, \n eng. Dimitar Petrov, PhD
2, Prof. Boyan Kamenov Str. \n 1700 Sofia, Bulgaria
